mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.clazz_id as clazzId ,a.zuoye_uuid_number as zuoyeUuidNumber ,a.zuoye_name as zuoyeName ,a.zuoye_types as zuoyeTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.zuoye_file as zuoyeFile ,a.zuoye_content as zuoyeContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,clazz.laoshi_id as clazzLaoshiId ,clazz.clazz_name as clazzName ,clazz.clazz_address as clazzAddress ,clazz.clazz_number as clazzNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM zuoye a left JOIN clazz clazz ON a.clazz_id = clazz.id left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} or clazz.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and ( a.clazz_id = #{params.clazzId} )
and a.zuoye_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeUuidNumber},'%')
and a.zuoye_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeName},'%')
and a.zuoye_types = #{params.zuoyeTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.zuoye_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeContent},'%')
and a.clazz_id IS NOT NULL
and clazz.clazz_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.clazzName},'%')
and clazz.clazz_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.clazzAddress},'%')
and clazz.clazz_number >= #{params.clazzNumberStart}
and clazz.clazz_number <= #{params.clazzNumberEnd}
and clazz.clazz_number = #{params.clazzNumber}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(clazz.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(clazz.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
